name: Dandy Stool in Shagreen w/Polished Steel
description: The Dandy Stool inlaid in cream shagreen is a chic seating piece for any space. The sides of the pieces are completely inlaid in polished steel adding another luxurious and modern element to the piece. Available in other finishes and as a bench, see images at end of slide. This piece is designed by Kifu Augousti, the daughter of Ria and Yiouri Augousti. Currently made to order 8-10 weeks. Design SKU reference KSTL04
